snippet: Gov. Rick Scott and his cabinet on Tuesday voted to allow anthropologists to begin exhuming the remains of boys who were buried decades ago at the Dozier School for Boys.
abstract: Gov Rick Scott and his cabinet vote to allow anthropologists from University of South Florida to begin exhuming remains of boys who were buried decades ago at Dozier School for Boys in Marianna; reform school, now closed, had history of neglect and abuse.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Scott and his cabinet on Tuesday voted to allow anthropologists to begin exhuming the remains of boys who were buried decades ago at the Dozier School for Boys.

headline.main: Florida: Exhumations Approved at Shuttered Reform School
headline.print_headline: Florida: Exhumations to Begin at Reform School Site

keywords.value: Dozier, Arthur G, School for Boys
keywords.name: organizations
